fields.summary: AuthenticationFilter should use Configuration.getPropsWithPrefix instead of iterator

fields.description: HADOOP-15411 fixed a similar issue for AuthenticationFilterInitializer. This issue can occur in RmAuthenticationFilterInitializer/TimelineAuthenticationFilterInitializer as well
fields.summary: RmAuthenticationFilterInitializer /TimelineAuthenticationFilterInitializer should use Configuration.getPropsWithPrefix instead of iterator
